title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 640 - Procedures For Approval Of The Development Of Comprehensive Health Services And The Establishment Of Such Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 640 - Procedures For Approval Of The Development Of Comprehensive Health Services And The Establishment Of Such Facilities

State Regulations
§ 640.1 - General provisions
§ 640.2 - Applications for approval of planning for comprehensive health services
§ 640.3 - Applications for authority for nonprofit corporations to solicit or apply for funds for development and establishment of comprehensive health services facilities
§ 640.4 - Applications for establishment of comprehensive health services facilities

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 640

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §2801-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
